website_summaries.verdict: Simple yet effective, Starfrit’s apple peeler sports a fun transparent style, takes up little counter space, and makes thinly peeling an apple a nearly effortless task.
pros: Flawlessly peels an apple in moments
Strong suction cups secure peeler in place
cons: Far less sturdy than a steel apple peeler

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen gadget ever:-)
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I wrote a review of this thing last year when I got one for my wife as a present. I guess I forgot.... In short, this thing works great. My wife loves it...see the video for proof of that:-) She just used it a few days ago to peel not only apples but a large bag of small potatoes. Saved a ton of time. I would say that you need to be careful of the blade and the sharp prongs that stick into whatever you are peeling. Best kitchen gadget ever:-)
customer_reviews.author: E. Dyrda

customer_reviews.title: Great little contraption
customer_reviews.text: This little plastic thing peeled 31 apples in no time. I was very happy with it. I did have a couple oddly shaped bumpy apples that it fought with, but for the price I think I can peel an apple or two with a hand peeler. I didn't want to push it too hard and break it. It saved me so much time making pies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time Saving Device
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. If you have young children or grandchildren, you usually need to peel an apple and cut it up before you give it to them. This better than using the potato peeler. The only problem I have so far is that for small apples (for small children) it does not seem to peel as well as it does for medium and large apples. That is why I gave it 4 stars, not 5. As I get more experienced with this, I may up this to a 5 start review. Otherwise it is great time saver, even with one apple and great for aging hands that are not as flexible as they once were.
customer_reviews.author: tennistoni

customer_reviews.title: Great Design!
customer_reviews.text: I use to have an antique apple peeler that peeled and cored the apple without sliceing it. No added attachments, just put the apple on and crank. Apparently that technology has been lost along with my apple peeler. How ever this unit works great and it comes with a corer slicer as a bonus. Very smooth operation with easy cranking. The corer/ slicer works well also. Yes it is plastic. Don’t be discouraged, it is high quality and sturdy and made well. Takes up very little space and is very stable with 4 suction cup feet with quick release tabs. No need to mention price, it is about the lowest out there.
customer_reviews.author: MR.

customer_reviews.title: The trash is the best place for this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Boy did I get taken with this POS. I have had it for several months now and haven't peeled an apple yet. It's not like I didn't try. I have run dozens of apples through this machine of all sizes and shapes trying to find something that would work. No luck! This thing simply will not peel an apple. Corer/cutter works well but I could have found one at the grocery store a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Memory

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this peeler - the peel is thin and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this peeler - the peel is thin and it it's fast, just a few seconds per apple. It does a nice job at the top of the fruit too. However I had it in the sink and rinsed it then discovered water inside which took a long time to dry because there are tiny holes on the bottom and little ventilation. However, you sure can see when there's something inside. The other comment is it takes a lot of muscle to wedge it with the bonus cutter and my wedges weren't even in size. But it's a bonus I guess. Other wedgers I've used have been as hard to push through and a sharper one might be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: j02013

customer_reviews.title: Works well to peel l apples if you can get it to stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as it seemed like it might be an easier and faster choice to peel apples when making homemade applesauce then just doing it with a regular knife. The suction cups don’t suction well to the countertop thus when trying to peel an apple it often becomes on suctioned and you lose the grip you need in order to peel the apples. Plus the plastic handle comes off very easily. It’s easily put back on but still frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: BRose

customer_reviews.title: Great, Quick & Fun Apple Peeler
customer_reviews.text: I've already worn one of these out, after much use. Had to have another one because I and my daughter don't care for the apple peel. This along with the corer/slicer to section the apple is a wonderful little gadget. My 6 yr. old loves to help with it, but I do watch her carefully because the blade in the peeler is very, very sharp. We love it & I'll buy another one when I need to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: works but cleaning is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical I would like this as it looks like a cheap plastic toy. BUT it really works! I'm not sure it is going to last for decades like a nice metal one would be expected to do, but for $14 it was a pleasant surprise. The wider blade takes a wider ribbon of skin off in one go. The only problem is that water gets in between the parts and you have to get a screwdriver, unscrew it and air dry. They could definitely improve on that- 'wipe dry' is not adequate- it should stand up to being hand washed, so they need to re-engineer it so you can more easily take it apart for air drying.
customer_reviews.author: Very Picky Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a cheap, flimsy peeler.......but it works! After using the metal peeler that clamps to the counter and cuts the apple for you, I find this to be a much better peeler. The metal peeler would break soft apples into pieces and would not peel worth a darn. Even though this is plastic, it does suction to the counter pretty well and has true peeling power. It comes with a metal corer/cutter that is very sturdy and works very well. No more frustration making apple pies & crisps!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a product review but, I felt the absolute need to do one for this! I LOVE it! I had an apple peeler years ago and it was a pain! This one was easy and I adore it! If you’re looking for an apple peeler... BIY THIS ONE!!!! Trust me, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Depagnier

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect apple peeler
customer_reviews.text: This peeler is worth buying. I peeled 3 large Fuji apples in less than 3 minutes. The shape of my apples weren’t exactly round as suggested by other reviewers but in my opinion the peeler did its job. Children will get a kick out of watching it peel and using it themselves with supervision of course 😉. It would be great if it could peel other fruit and potatoes but for the price and how lightweight it is, I don’t think it deserves less then 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: koiluvr

customer_reviews.title: At first, I loved it. Then it started skipping gears.
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked flawlessly for about a month and I loved it. I used it mostly for apples and pears. It worked great and I loved it. However, about a month into the use, the gears started to skip and make a loud popping noise. It seems the blade got dull or stuck or something. Either way, cleaning it didn't help. Had to return it because it was getting worse and worse.
customer_reviews.author: Testing Test

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty good peeler
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good peeler. I gave it four stars because of the bonus core slicer; otherwise it would have been only 3 stars. I tried it with a small Jazz apple and it peeled most of it. It jammed up a few times and I was afraid I might break the handle if I turned it too hard. I think it might work better with a larger apple, such as a red delicious or a Fuji apple. Regardless, it shaved off about 10 minutes from having to manually peel 6 apples.
customer_reviews.author: QuietU2

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I make my own baby food and apples are so much work! I always dreaded preparing them because of the time it took to peel them all. I found this peeler and figured it’s worth a shot for the inexpensive price and I am very pleased! It serves its purpose and get the job done and I am a happy mama!
customer_reviews.author: Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Peeling apples can be QUICK and FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I was asked to make a dish for a dinner party that required me to peel 15 apples. Using a paring knife and then a vegetable peeler took me a half hour to peel only 2 apples so I looked on Amazon to order an apple peeler. I wanted one that did a good job and was easy to store. I couldn’t have made a better choice. The Starfrit Apple Peeler is unbelievably easy to use! Each apple took about 5 seconds to peel. It’s extremely sturdy, very well built, easy to clean and beautiful looking! It exceeded all my expections. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: RobRen

customer_reviews.title: Great Peeler! Not so great design.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for peeling and 5 stars for that! Smooth peeling and just gets the skin and not the fruit. My problem is with how this gets juice from the apple and water when rinsing it to clean it into the inner cavity. It cannot be taken apart and cleaned. This shows water still inside after sitting to dry for two days. And discoloration from the apple juice. The only thing you can do is put some water in through holes on bottom and shake around hoping it gets all of the apple juices out and doesn’t stain it too much. I assume this will eventually start to grow mildew due to this design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jackieg

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly suprised!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this based on a video I had seen on-line. As far as peeling apples and potatoes fast, it works great. I had a bit of an issue trying to get the suction cups to stick to my counter top, but was stable enough to keep peeling.
customer_reviews.author: M. Perfetti

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had serious doubts about this product as I've tried other apple peelers in the past. HOWEVER, this product is really amazing. It works exactly as it says it will. Even my mom, ever the skeptic, thought it was pretty cool. It works fast and smoothly and if you have any sort of arthritic hand problems (as I do), it's perfect. I love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bissy

customer_reviews.title: Game-changer!!
customer_reviews.text: I peeled six Gala apples, sliced them through the bonus cutter, then sliced into small chunks in FIVE MINUTES. Absolutely performs as one would hope. This is a game-changer.
customer_reviews.author: Julia & Fred

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: My first apple peeler and I picked an excellent one. First, thank all who gave this peeler a glowing review, you were right. Easy to use, works perfectly, easy to clean and most of all great price. 100% pleased!
customer_reviews.author: BigAl64

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I was concerned about this being plastic and so inexpensive. It made quick work of my bushel of apples. The odd shaped ones might not have pealed completely but it still pealed most of the peal off and then I only had a few swipes with a veggie peeler.
customer_reviews.author: re3ver

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Great little gaget. Works best on round apples. Not so much on Red Delicious. But did work enough so they were easier to peel. I have never made applesauce or Apple butter before but I saw apples on sale so I purchased a lot, got some recipes and went for it. I cannot imagine how long it would have taken to peel 10 pounds of apples without this peeler! Next on to Apple pie. This is a time saver that is worth more than I paid for it. Surprise!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Eh. It peels all size apples fast, but you still have to manually peel either the top or bottom of the apple (depending where it starts). It seemed to work better when the top of the apple was placed downward on the spikes. Sometimes it would miss spots and only peel about 3/4 of the apple. It's not super sturdy, it is made of plastic. One of the suction cup feet came off mine the first time used. The screw is stripped so it will not stay in the base - I hold the unit down on the counter while cranking just to be safe. Doubt I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kjbrew

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use that kids want to help with baking apple desserts.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr. old great nephew loves to help in the kitchen and when he visited for Thanksgiving and saw mine, he told his Mom that if he had one, it would make it so much easier for him to help her make apple desserts. So basically, this is so easy the kids can use it. That's the best review ever!
customer_reviews.author: Budget Designer in Training

customer_reviews.title: broke on the 22nd apple
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on good reviews. I have to juice a large quantity of apples daily. I cannot afford organic apples, so I buy regular apples and peel them. My hand cramps up after peeling about 10 apples, so I thought I would buy a hand cranked apple peeler. Saw this one on amazon, and decided to buy it. At first, it worked well. Not perfectly, but well. I was very careful with it and did everything the way I was supposed to. Unfortunately, on the 22nd apple, the cog that meshed with the crank broke, and that was the end. Flimsy as hell. I cannot recommend it to anyone, and wish I had never purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: webber

customer_reviews.title: Peel and cut an Apple in less than 60 seconds!
customer_reviews.text: This thing absolutely works as described it just works easier with 2 hands. It has suction cups but they're not very big. You can use them but I recommend just holding the base with one hand and turning the crank with the other. Other than that this product works perfectly. You can peel and cut an Apple and less than 60 seconds
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: It works every day and very time saving if you have a toddler in the house!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this while I was out of town and it's actually a wonderful kitchen gadget. I did not have high hopes if I'm being honest but it works 100% of the time and it's really easy to use. We use one of those round apple slicer thingies after peeling it. We have a 2 year old that will only eat peeled apples and he wants several per day. This has saved us a lot of time and annoyance with using a knife. Anyone that has a 2 year old should own one.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie Clements

customer_reviews.title: Get Quaility Apple Pealer.  Here is also a tip for what apples to get.  And easy clean up.
customer_reviews.text: This Pealer works really well if you get the correct Apple. You want to get medium sized apples that are hard if they are to big or soft they won’t work with this Pealer. We had a Pealer in the past that could do the bigger apples but this one is way better since it works very quickly and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dispatch Tech

customer_reviews.title: I Almost Had to Give Up!
customer_reviews.text: i bought the peeler as a gift for my grandson because he loves apples and gears and spinning things. the first one arrived at his mother's barber shop broken inside a box that wasn't damaged in any way. i had the replacement sent to my home, but that one also arrived broken inside a box without any damage. i ordered one more and it arrived in perfect condition inside a box also in perfect condition! finally!!! i don't know how or why for the broken items, but it certainly was very annoying! at any rate, my grandson is finally having fun making and eating his long ribbons of fresh apples.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson in GRMI

customer_reviews.title: Be Very Careful With Large Apples!
customer_reviews.text: I used this peeler when I dried several batches of apples. It worked best on apples that were round & symmetrical. Most of my apples were asymmetrical with bad spots and the blade would frequently get hung up. I was able to fiddle with the unit when it did this with fairly good results. Also, liquid (water & juice from the apple) managed to get inside even though I did not immerse the unit. Overall, for the price, I was pleased with my purchase. Update: Sept 2015. When I loaded a large apple and turned the crank, one of the plastic teeth from the gear broke. I had to trash it. 2nd time around, I bought a metal one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: No peeler danger
customer_reviews.text: Peeler doesn’t quite start at the bottom of the apple but I cut the bottom off flat and that made it easier to slice. I made A LOT of baked apples over the holidays and this made my prep easier and safer.
customer_reviews.author: PegS

customer_reviews.title: Time-tested, grandma approved
customer_reviews.text: I spent nearly 2 hours reviewing apple peelers online with my grandma. She’s been using the same one for 20 years and has repaired it to the point where it could no longer be repaired. Afterwards she drove 1.5 hours to Menard’s only to discover she didn’t like the apple peelers they had. She informed me she was coming back over. I love my grandma, but I was thinking I would have to kill her. Rather than killing grandma I went ahead and ordered her this one. When it arrived she called and informed me this was the exact same one she had used for 20 years. She was very happy, and I got 2 free pies. Love you grandma!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Best Apple Peeler Ever
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT let the "toyish" look of this apple peeler fool you. Last week, I peeled less then half a bushel of apples by "rheumatic" hands and was dying by the time I finished in what seemed like an eternity. My peeler came today, and I went through a bushel in a flash! And the peeler does not waste the apple. The peels are very thin but without leaving peel behind. I LOVE THIS LITTLE GEM!!! If you are sitting on the fence trying to decide between this and the old standard (the old red iron one--I had one) don't sweat it. You won't be disappointed. Take it from someone with advanced stages of rheumatoid arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: nally

customer_reviews.title: Amazing peeler
customer_reviews.text: The best apple peeler I've ever used. I love this and all of my 4 boys use it daily. I love that it shaves the apple and doesn't core it. My kids eat more apples because they can peel them safely now
customer_reviews.author: James S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super fast peeler
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old fashioned crank peeler. This saves me so much time. Easy to clean and super easy to use. Doesn't core like my old one but is so much quicker I prefer it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Miracles

customer_reviews.title: WORKHORSE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought for sure the plastic would be cheap and break easily but this is my 3rd apple season with it and I love it more than my grandmas antique peeler that has lasted generations. My MIL who ONLY used her 100 year old cast iron peeler for years was converted to this one and can't quit raving about it! Peels the thinnest skin off not making a juicy mess! I'm buying a back up just in case!
customer_reviews.author: M. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Works great for store bought apples, not so great on irregulars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Simple to use. I wouldn't have bought this because it looks like it should be next to an easy bake oven in your daughters room. But the video left by another reviewer convinced me. Now this works great on store bought apples. But deformed apples, some red delicious, home grown or seconds from orchard will get caught up. The apple doesn't have to be perfectly round. but big divets or irregular shapes make blade dig in and stop. I'd imagine a way more expensive all metal will cut through those for you heavy users.But for the money, this is great for the average user
customer_reviews.author: Daiv

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! This is so easy to use. I’m right handed and recently broke my right wrist. I love having an apple every morning for breakfast. I’m not able to eat the skin on fruit due to having ulcerative colitis so I have to peel the apple. I haven’t been able to do that being able to use only my left hand, but can now with this apple peeler. The suction cups keep it firmly on place so I can use it with only one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Bradish

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: I make an apple cake once or twice a year. Peeling the apples has always been my LEAST favorite part of this tradition. This peeler has made fast work of it! Is it especially durable? Nope. Do I need it to be for as often as I use it. Again, nope! I LOVE this convenience! And for $12 it's a bargain! If you will need a peeler for heavy duty use, keep scrolling. If you only need it occasionally, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: MostlyQuiet

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This apple peeler is awesome, can't believe I waited so long to get one. Takes seconds to peel an apple and just takes the very slightest bit of the apple, so much better than doing it with a knife or hand peeler.
customer_reviews.author: trinity1

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Made the apple harvest a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Made the apple harvest a breeze. My freezer is filled with apples now though, so it may have made it too easy breezy. Gave a box of apples to a friend and loaned her this. Pretty sure she will be buying one for herself. My brother has an orchard and I saw that he used a pairing knife to peel all of his apples. I'll be getting him one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Christa F

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, just lacking in longevity
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as expected. The only reason I can't give it 5 stars, is that this is the second one I have had to buy in 4 years. We do use it consistently in the fall, but it really did not last as long as I would have expected. The handle will also come off, it not careful. Does not tolerate misshapen apples either.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Fast, efficient and oddly satisfying
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It's so easy and fast. I peeled a whole bag of apples in about 15 minutes. Takes just a minute to figure out and then, off you go. My kids wait in line to take their turn at this oddly satisfying wonder. If only they would actually eat the apples.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Carty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use fast and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite apple peeler. Reason is because it’s so easy to use that even my 9 year old can do it. Also, all ya need is a counter for feet to stick. It gives you extra blades and lastly it peels the apple faster and more accurately than my more expensive previous Apple peeler without having to adjust it every time. All you need is this and a handheld sliver/corer for after its peeled. So easy.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Performs as cheap as it looks - Waste of money - faster to peel by hand.
customer_reviews.text: It is as cheap as it looks! Similar to other purchasers, I read all the positive reviews and thought maybe it is better than it looks. However, after trying it you have have to be extremely gentle as it is all plastic (it feels and behaves as cheap as it looks - you definitely get what you pay for). In theory the razor moves around the apple and moves up, down and all around. It missed the apple and it took quite a bit of time just to peel one apple. Similar to the other reviewers, I found it faster to peel them by hand than use this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Chard

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, though somewhat simple
customer_reviews.text: Great peeler. Comes with several extra razors which can be easily swapped out. The only thing I don't like about this one is that there is no slicing/ coring option. However, it does the job it was built for quite well. Additionally, the plastic construction, while cheaper, is not very attractive (though I imagine most people wouldn't leave an apple peeler hanging out on their counter anyhow).
customer_reviews.author: Jon Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Finally an apple peeler that works well
customer_reviews.text: This one works well. We had another apple peeler from an expensive specialty store that was unsatisfactory. Because of the vertical axis, this one can handle soft apples better than most other peelers. It is easy to use and the original blade is still sharp after several years of use. It does not core and slice while peeling like some peelers, but that is the easy part. We mainly use it for dried apples and apple butter. It handles small, medium and large apples well, but skips here and there on some extra-large apples. We have used it on pears and it did OK on the round parts.
customer_reviews.author: Gravelle Pyle

customer_reviews.title: Apple Peeler
customer_reviews.text: This apple peeler works great! Exceeded my expectations. I have used it for several months and on large and small apples. Does great every time. If you have a lot of apples to peel, this will save you time. I think it takes less than 10 seconds to peel and that includes putting the apple on the machine, peeling time, and removing the apple.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: apple pealer
customer_reviews.text: It does a fair job pealing an apple, but unless the apple is perfectly round it leaves areas that are unpealed. Since I am unable to hold a knife to peal the apple it is better than my alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Brown

customer_reviews.title: Slick!
customer_reviews.text: Slick! That was my response to using this peeler the first time. I can't believe how fast and easy...the apple was peeled in seconds. Seriously fast and unbelievably easy. You've got to try this for yourself! Peeling a bag of apples will be done in a jiffy without cramped hands and a messy counter. I normally write comprehensive reviews, but so many people have already done that. My advice is to order and try it yourself. I envision summer parties with apple crisp and cinnamon applesauce and apple cakes and...
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Pochciol

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I've normally peel my apples with a knife, but now I have trouble bending my fingers so this was a great purchase for me. Also it includes an apple corer....Perfect !!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn D

customer_reviews.title: Great product works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to using it and I LOVE it!!! I love to bake but the main reason I wouldn't ever make apple cakes and crisps was due to the pain of peeling apples. i just won't do it I hate it so much. Well this little peeler perfectly peels an apple in about three seconds! Then with a corer/slicer apparatus it's a fast and simple matter to finish the job. Baked apple desserts are the best and my absolute favorite so I'm really glad to have found this.
customer_reviews.author: Flowergirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for peeling large quantities
customer_reviews.text: We used this peeler at church to peel 2 bushels of apples for a church function. It worked like a champ! I was done with the peeling in far less time than my crew of older people would have been done, working with knives and vegetable peelers.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Best apple peeler ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've had expensive Apple Peelers before, which only did a good job with a perfectly shaped apple. This peeler is the best I've ever had, apples, pears and potatoes!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great apple peeler.
customer_reviews.text: This silly-looking peeler works great! It stays on the counter and peels an apple fast and perfectly. Impressed. Love that it looks like a toy.
customer_reviews.author: JanMontAm

customer_reviews.title: Saved my marriage
customer_reviews.text: This apple peeler saved my marriage..lol..My wife loves hosting thanksgiving, but dreaded peeling endless amounts of apples..she says by far the best little kitchen gadget she's ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Stabbed myself trying to get the apple off the nail type holder. Works fine but only adults should use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Blaski

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a mom I am giving my daughter healthy snacks such as apple slices. Apples were always my least favorite thing to give my daughter because I HATED to peel the apple; not anymore! I love this apple peeler! It is so quick and easy to peel an apple and with the apple slicer you have a healthy snack in no time. My daughter loves to bring her stool over to the counter to watch the apple spin around on the peeler. The only negative thing I can say about it is I wish it could go in the dishwasher, but other than that I love this little gadget. Now I can finally make a homemade apple pie!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about a plastic peeler, but the price was good so I bought. It arrived quickly and came with the apple corer as promised AND it also had an extra or replacement blade as well. I have a tile counter so the suction cups stick no problem. I find that if I anchor it with two fingers as I turn it doesn't wiggle at all. I would take away stars for something trivial like that. The apples I peeled were for a pie and for drying. The peeler worked perfectly each and every apple was peeled in a jiffy - my 12 yr old son loved used it as well. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesomesauce!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I bought this apple peeler based on previous reviews and it works great. It's so easy I could do it one-handed and my two-year-old can also operate It. The only assembly required is attaching the handle once you remove it from the box. It also comes with a spare blade and an apple wedged. The Apple peel comes off in one long spiral and my kids absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great Apple Peeler
customer_reviews.text: Really works great, shaves an apple totally in seconds. Really great product, But beware of the razor blade cutter. you have to make sure it is cycled down to the bottom before you remove the peeled apple or it can bite you!!. The slicer also works great for making nice thick slices for eating.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great apple peeler
customer_reviews.text: This product works fantastically and makes peeling Avery's. I do wish we had bought one that Coors the apple as well but this product works as expected. Only downfall is juice can get into the base. They did put drain holes in the bottom so you can rinse it out though. Does not work well on very small apples
customer_reviews.author: Joe Burns

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow does this work great! I got it because I wanted something smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow does this work great! I got it because I wanted something smaller than the classic peeler. Saw a video about it so I decided to take a chance. Super easy to use and clean. The blade is nice and sharp and peels effortlessly. The only problem you may have is if the apple is a little irregularly shaped it can cause the blade to miss spots, but they're easy to clean up and not numerous.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Miller

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is: BUY IT! This little thing makes you want buy apples just because you own it. I'm off to the store right now to grab me a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Smiggy

customer_reviews.title: need to go apple picking!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got into making homemade apple butter, and want to make applesauce and some homemade pies. So I purchased this item to help take off the pain of hand peeling apples and I was thrilled to see that I received the apple corer as a bonus! I wasn't really paying super close attention to the whole title when I made the purchase but was more focused on reviews.. I am glad to add this gadget to my kitchen as it is already making life easier!
customer_reviews.author: Karly Moore

customer_reviews.title: Could have a better adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of how this works, however unless you are using very large apples it doesn't work well. On small apples it does not work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Anjilluv

customer_reviews.title: One and done
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product the first time we used it. It easily peeled 8 apples and the corer was great. However, we just got it out to use for a second time and didn't get through one apple before a piece broke off so "one and done." Don't waste your money. UPDATE: I am impressed with the return policy which allows me to get a refund or replacement. Since there are so many positive reviews, I've opted for a replacement in hopes that the problem I had was fairly unique.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lil Apple Annie
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little gadget and IF the apples are centered perfectly on the spike, it will peel them quickly though not always thoroughly. I found I had to go back with a peeler and get the remenants of peel left in spots. The spike that holds the fruit isn't always reliable and the apple shifted or pulled loose at times. Basically, for the price it is a useful tool. Seems like the refill blades are expensive and hard to find. Hope the blades stay sharp a long time. Generally satisfied with this purchase, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use once I got the hang of it,the blade starts peeling from the bottom and works it's way around to the top as you turn the handle.It's not perfect,meaning it leaves some skin remaining around the very bottom and top area.Other than that it's no biggie.With this thing I was able to peel 6 large apple's in under 3 minutes,and the bonus apple corer & slicer made things even easier.Just be very careful when removing the blade for cleaning.I love this! and in my opinion it's well worth the price.Easy to use,easy to clean,bonus accessories included and a hassle saver.What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Keke

customer_reviews.title: I got skinned
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this peeler would do the job, but I was totally disappointed. This peeler really is like a toy. It was not strong enough to cut through the apple skin. I had to manually force start the blade into the skin and assist the peeler to remove the skin. At some points it felt that the plastic peeler was going to crack or break. I tried it twice and will donate it to the city dump.
customer_reviews.author: MOCADIVA

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Exactly What was described. Would buy again. Makes peeling fun and easy
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Peeler
customer_reviews.text: I had an apple peeler corer slicer before that worked well, but was such a pain to set up and take apart that I stopped using it. I debated even trying another, particularly one that looked like this, but I'm glad I tried it. This one peels even better and is less trouble. With the slicer, it makes a nice combo. I just wish it looked better, but I couldn't take away a star for that given I knew what it looked like when I purchased it. I've only had it two weeks, so I can't speak to longevity, but we love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is amazing. I was hesitant because quite frankly it looks cheap/flimsy. I made 2 apple pies on thanksgiving and this (coupled with an apple slicer) cut my prep time down by more than half.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little device is amazing. It doesn't look like it would be anything ...
customer_reviews.text: This little device is amazing. It doesn't look like it would be anything special, but it peels apples in seconds - all sizes. I've had mine for about 3 years and have given them as gifts - everyone is amazed. If you like to make apple pies or cook anything calling for peeled apples, you will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri M

customer_reviews.title: best kitchen investment!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few years ago when our apple trees started producing a ton of apples, and I was making applesauce. Loved the applesauce, hated peeling the apples. I purchased this, and the peeling is a breeze now - i actually have fun doing it (chuckling to myself the whole time about how much time I'm saving!). Just started a pot of applesauce this morning, and had the crockpot full in no time. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: laurie roffol

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly from reviews. Was going to get the old fashioned ones that clamp and I'm glad I DID NOT! This little peeler is so cool!!! Takes the whole peel off with ease ad clean up is a snap! Comes with free slicer/corer I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! Came sooner then expected too!!! A ++
customer_reviews.author: Stacey, CA

customer_reviews.title: Freaking. Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly because I was planning on making some apple pies and figured this would make it easy. It totally does. It’s super easy to use, and came with an apple cutter as well! It’s very quick to actually skin the apples and it does such a good job. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: L.roths

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, spend a few extra books and get ones that works. Gets about half the skin off then have to peel the rest by hand anyway. You get what you pay for, don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Saw on YouTube video and worked as demonstrated
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm for me. I prefer to eat an apple without its peel--I know--the best part for you. However, the peel is very thin---basically no apple taken with the skin. For some reason I didn't know it came with an apple slicer so in the end you can peel and slice and enjoy. Comes with spare blade.
customer_reviews.author: sstall

customer_reviews.title: OK product
customer_reviews.text: The peeler works good, not sure how long it will last since it's out of a light weight plastic. The apple slice doesn't work very well, blades are dull and does not cut completely through the apple.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Peel an apple in seconds
customer_reviews.text: This product separates humans from the apes. I peel apples in seconds instead of minutes. It cannot be recommended highly enough. Peels potatoes, apples, pears, anything that has skin or that needs a thin layer removed from the outside. It's sturdy and easy to clean and store. The smaller, round, more solid apples work best in this peeler. Soft red apples or any with bruise spots will cause a malfunction and then you're back to manual peeling with a knife.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Crank is hitching up
customer_reviews.text: After peeling 1/4 bushel of apples, the crank handle started to give resistance while turning. It was as if it hit a bump in the road at a certain spot. Still works but don't know how much longer. I loved this device until this started happening.
customer_reviews.author: REM

customer_reviews.title: Invest in something better if you will be using it frequently
customer_reviews.text: It worked, but not very fluidly. I had to anchor it to the counter top with my "chest" and then crank the handle. If only the peeled apples looked even close to the picture. *sigh* Still beats doing it by hand with a peeler or knife, but not by a wide margin.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Eh....
customer_reviews.text: Well I got the item yesterday and tried an apple....well the apple peeler started to make wobbly cranking noise and was a bit hard to turn on some spots on the apple that the crank started to sound like it was breaking. The apple didn't peel all the way either. I tried another apple, and had to hold the area that you crank so it would not make the noises and peel the darn apple. This time it peeled 90% of the apple. Was very disappointed in it but we will keep it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy apple peeler
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and does a great job peeling with the wide blade. My daughter loves using this to peel her apples.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: How to obtain replacement blades
customer_reviews.text: There have been several comments about the difficulty or expense of obtaining replacement blades for the Pro-Apple Peeler. From my own research, they can only be obtained directly from the importer, Atlantic Promotions Inc. The blades are available in a 3-pack that sells for $4.95 + $2.95 shipping. Leave a message and a contact number at their toll-free number in Quebec, 1-800-361-6232 (press 2 for English). They'll call you back and take an order over the phone. They accept only Visa and Mastercard. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: William the Reviewr

customer_reviews.title: Best Pealer Ever
customer_reviews.text: Was very skeptical until I saw the video in use. It looks like a kids toy but it is very well built and works unbelievable well on all size and shape apples. If apple peeling is not your thing but you love pricessing fresh apples into pie, sauce, jelly, you need this gizmo. way better than the tradition peelers
customer_reviews.author: M. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of apples from the tree this year and needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of apples from the tree this year and needed a quick way to put them up for pies. A few complaints - even with the suction cups, it moves around while turning the handle - it does NOT core the apple - and if the apple is out of round - it will not peel the whole apple. Some of the juice leaks down into the bottom and I cannot rinse it out. This is the second one I have purchased, the reason being - I could not find replacement blades.
customer_reviews.author: Billie-Marie Pilotti

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the looks fool you, it works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried because this wasn't the peeler I had originally planned to purchase and it looks more like a giant toy. However, it works great and I am very pleased with my purchase. It comes with everything you need to peel and slice apples for pie. Super easy and quick. I had no trouble peeling the apples for pie (my most dreaded task) I had 5 apples done in record time and completely painless. It actually makes me eat more apples now I can peel them so fast.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the 2nd year
customer_reviews.text: Our apple trees gave us a bounty of apples last fall. My pantry looks wonderful with all of the pretty jars lined up waiting to be eaten or given for gifts. I used this peeler for the second year and it does a great job, peels the apples as it is supposed to. My daughter laughed when she saw me using it but then was impressed with how well it worked. Now it is all cleaned up, back in its box waiting for what the trees will provide us this fall. Well worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a lot of things from Amazon and this has got to be "one" of the best items I have purchased. I bought it for my mother in law and I was blown away when I used it, it is incredible!!!! I just purchased 2 more, 1 for myself and 1 as a gift. 5 star is the rating I give for this product, the suction could be better but the slicer makes up for that.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: Received this item this morning and already have an apple cake in the oven. This has to be one of the easiest gadgets I have ever had. It does a perfect job, is so easy to use and am so impressed with it that I have already gifted another one to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sammypot

customer_reviews.title: Easy peeling!
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out the correct way of using this peeler, it was a breeze. Shaves so much time when making pies, tarts, etc. Love it
customer_reviews.author: njcath

customer_reviews.title: nice, metal red one) and the automatic battery powered ...
customer_reviews.text: Third peeler I've bought. The others I had were ok (the manual, nice, metal red one) and the automatic battery powered one. The problem with the others is they 1) don't get enough of the full apple (top and bottom) and the metal one cuts too much of the apple (goes too deep in from the skin). This one is cheaper than both and is perfect. It gets the apple top to bottom and is so nicely done it only removes the very fine layer of skin, not taking too much apple with it. Fantastic, ordering another right now.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy as 1,2, 3!
customer_reviews.text: As easy as 1, 2, 3! Took it out of the box, put the handle on it, and stuck apple and started spinning! Just like that it was smooth and delicious! It came is an apple slicer and our daughter loved it and in fact she did everything. Bought it so we can eat more fruits and tonight is just the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Ewa

customer_reviews.title: Makes fun apple strips.... just keep peeling and peeling....
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves to peel the skin off of the apple and then keep peeling and peeling the whole apple down to almost the core. This creates long apple strips for eating that have no peel and no choking hazard! Wonderful way for very small children to eat apples safely. Would be an easy way to serve apples at a daycare. We went through 4 apples just this weekend! I took away 1 star because water easily gets trapped in the base of the unit when I try to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It ok better with "the right sized apple". Also in washing it, the base seems to hold some water. Also try not to reposition the apple to much as it weakens the bottom of the apple making it fit loose on the holding prongs. I suppose you could turni it upside down but by then I'd just use one of the "over the top" wedge slicers and live with the peel.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old granddaughter loves using this. It's fun to watch the gears move when the apple turns. Nice, smooth peels. It doesn't take long at all to peel a bunch of apples. When you're done, you wish you had more. It's that much fun! This thing peels real big apples with no problems. The cutter rotates around the apple as the apple itself spins. Suction cups hold the peeler securely to a smooth surface. What a great affordable product. You can't go wrong!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works great when used properly
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews, I feel a majority of the negatives were user error. From the sounds of it, they were cranking the wrong way, which really doesn't work well. It's simple and works well, and with the bonus slicer/core remover, makes apple slices a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Josh C

product_meta.title: Starfrit 93013 Pro-Apple Peeler with bonus core slicer
product_meta.description:
STARFRIT APPLE PRO-PEELER 
Apple Pro Peeler by Starfrit PEELS ALL TYPES OF APPLES IN 5 SECONDS OR LESS!
Peels all types of apples! The chore of peeling apples won't be one anymore thanks to the new Pro-Peeler. With its simplified mechanism made from resistant nylon, a stainless steel blade, an integrated spike holder and four suction-grip feet for utmost stability, the Pro-Peeler is the ideal product to peel apples or your favorite fruits effortlessly in a snap. The Apple Pro-Peeler removes only the skin of the fruit. It eliminates waste that hand peeling invariably creates. It is perfect for peeling large quantities of apples because of its efficient design and ease of use. Easy to clean and store.

COMES WITH BONUS CORER SLICER
Bonus! This practical corer slicer can be used on an unpeeled apple to enjoy fresh apple slices with the family. For recipes, first peel the apple with the Apple Pro-Peeler then use the corer slicer to make even slices. To use, hold the corer slicer on the top of your apple, centering over the apple's core. Press down firmly. Take out the slicer and the core and enjoy!

MAIN CHARACTERISTICS
 * Peels apples easily and effortlessly

 * Spring loaded arm adapts to various shapes and varieties of apples

 * Equipped with suction-grip feet for utmost stability

 * Easy to clean with a wet soapy cloth

 * Blades and spike holder are made of stainless steel

 * Plastic protectors for the blade and spike holder

 * Comes with 2 blades, corer slicer, instructions and recipe booklet

 * Unit measures approximately 7 x 10 x 24 inches

INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE AND CARE
Apple Pro Peeler Parts Step 1. Identify individual operating parts. Unit includes handle, protective cover for the blade and spike holder, peeling arm, rotating disk and suction cup feet.

Step 2. Anchor suction cup feet on a smooth, flat surface. Carefully remove protective plastic covers from steel prongs turning mechanism and peeling blade.

Step 3. Turn handle so that the peeling blade lines up at the bottom of the steel prongs mechanism. Mount apple on machine by pushing base of apple into the steel prongs.

Step 4. To peel an apple, gently turn handle clockwise to begin peeling. Continue turning until the peeling arm has turned a full 360 degrees back to its original position. Remove apple.

Step 5. Rinse steel prongs and peeling blade under running water and dry with a kitchen towel. Wipe other soiled areas with a sponge and dry. Do not place unit in dishwasher. Replace steel prongs and peeling blade protective covers when not in use. When storing, keep out of reach of children.
feature_bullets: Fast and easy to use - Peels apples effortlessly without making a mess
No waste - Peels the skin off the apple, not the fruit
Spring loaded arm adapts to various shapes and varieties of apples
Includes bonus corer slicer to serve sliced apples or prepare apple pies
Equipped with suction-grip feet for added stability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,089 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
